items.title: Thank you r/ClubPenguin!
items.summary: Just wanted to thank the r/ClubPenguin community on Reddit for being awesome! They participated in the survey I made to know more about player preferences and other stuff, and they have been super great and wholesome. A big thank you to the moderators for letting…
items.content_html:
Just wanted to thank the r/ClubPenguin community on Reddit for being awesome!

They participated in the survey I made to know more about player preferences and other stuff, and they have been super great and wholesome. A big thank you to the moderators for letting me share the project and blog too! :)

I finished setting up the Discord server, it doesn't have a logo yet but I will work on that ASAP, join it!

I will probably share some little secret stuff like some locations/WIP designs etc...

Until then, see you later! üêà

items.title: Dawn of a new adventure.
items.summary: Hello! This is the first of hopefully many blog posts! :)
items.content_html:
